main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book describes an unidentified flying object seen near Las Vegas, New Mexico in August 1959. The object was fruit-like in the hand at about 8 to 10 feet in diameter and seen on one occasion under one minute in duration.
interesting points: The UFO was fruit-like in the hand, estimated to be 8 to 10 feet in diameter, and was seen on one occasion near Las Vegas, New Mexico in August 1959.
The object was one of several, changed light in the area when no light should be there, and seemed to change altitude slightly and azimuth.
It was observed to hover around 5 minutes, then accelerated to the left and disappeared into the ground horizon.
The witnesses, a civilian couple, observed the object without the aid of any optical tools and reported the sighting under night light conditions.
No physical evidence of the UFO's existence was found in the area after the sighting.
